version_description:
1. Union War Optimization:
(1) Optimize the matching rules, making the matching more balanced
(2) Fix the display error of allies' ranking
(3) Fix the display error of union ranking
(4) Fix the display error of the chaos when entering the battlefield for some players
(5) Optimize the loading speed of entering the battlefield
2. Optimize the matching rules of Quantum Invasion in Union, making the matching more balanced

1. Fix the problem of invalid filter button of the faction store in Summon Tower
2. Fix the problem of abnormal effect of Cyber Ronin's talent
3. Fix the problem of abnormal display of Daily Tournament's video data
4. Fix the problem of abnormal display of price in the pop-up window interface of Daily Gift

1. Fix the problem of wrong description of the mail of Dominator Championship
2. Fix the problem of wrong display of mercenary avatar obtained in Star Trek
3. Fix the problem of abnormal display of the cleared logo in Time Rift
4. Fix the problem of abnormal interface display after the route of Union activity acquisition

1. Layered Armor system comes with a debut of Deadly Silver Wings just for Mother of Swarms. Cost only half during the event.
2. Add Armor Awaken system. God Slayer set of armor can be awakened after reaching level 15 with extra attributes. (Open test for XHERO 1-57 server only)
3. Add Armor Recast event. Recasting Armor during the event grants numerous rewards. (Open test for XHERO 1-57 server only)
4. Add Armor Rating/Sharing function. High-end Armor during the Recast can be shared to channels.
5. Miscellaneous optimizations regarding Union experience:1) Quantum Invasion: Hero can only be used once a day. Add better rewards and reduce the inflicted damage.2) Union Tech: Add Union Research function built up to grant powerful attributes to Heroes.(Open test for XHERO 1-57 server only)3) Union War: Add better rewards. Optimize visual effects.
6. 50 diamonds rewards can be claimed after watching Ads. Players who've already unlocked Double Check-in can claim immediately all rewards of this round.
7. Miscellaneous optimizations regarding Cyber Bar experience:1) Uncap max level of the bar. Boost rate of dropping high-rewarding quests.2) High tier Heroes are more requested for high-rewarding quests.
8. Optimize Ad experience: Add max limit to the rewards you claim. Add an Ad-related quest to Weekly Quests.
9. Add Valentine’s Day event. (Open test for XHERO 1-57 server only beginning at 1st Feb)
Bug fixed:
1. Display error of Wish Heroes

1. Add a new theme of Valentine’s Day to Home. The Valentine's Day event will open on February 5 for all services!
2. Miscellaneous optimizations regarding gaming experience.
3. Open-test functions will be available for all servers after this maintenance.
Bug fixed:
1. Display error of Wish Heroes
2. Model loading issue in Space Discovery

Optimization
1. Tier of Hero required for completing the quests in Cyberbar

Bug Fixed
1. Red dot Indicator on Union Tech icon

1. Optimized BOSS challenge gameplay, increased challenge attempts per day, enabling players to try more lineup collocations:
1) Hub Trials: increased challenge attempts to 5 per day, final calculation based on the attempt dealing highest damage.
2) Void Championship: increased attempts times to 10 per day, final calculation based on the 2 attempts dealing highest damage.
2. Optimized the effect of display of gear icons. Added a display of gear rating.
3. Optimization in Union:
1) Union Tech: Added Crit Damage Resistance and Crit Resistance into Union Institute.
3) Quantum Invasion: Optimized the display of leaderboard information, supporting cross-week preservation of battle lineup.
4.Optimized the translation of some languages.
5.Optimized button display in game.

1.New hero "Rose Battlefield-Kinley"
2.Optimized scene of Home Menu
